attributes.action: If No Brexit, call a General Election, but no current MP's allowed to stand
attributes.additional_details: They have all moved positions for various reasons from both a remain and leave outlook.
attributes.background: All current MP's have failed our democracy for a wide range of reasons.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament to decide who stands for election. That is the responsibility of political parties and individuals.

You could sign this petition if you would like Parliament to dissolve for a new general election:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235547
